title: How to Open a Shaken Soda

steps.title: Use your finger to snap or flick the side of the can.
steps.content: Use your finger to snap or flick the side of the can.

steps.title: Turn the can a quarter turn & flick it again.
steps.content: Turn the can a quarter turn & flick it again.

steps.title: Feel for the "pressure" on the container.
steps.content: Feel for the "pressure" on the container. If it feels hard, then wait until the pressure settles.

steps.title: Slip your finger underneath the soda tab very carefully.
steps.content: Slip your finger underneath the soda tab very carefully.

steps.title: Wait for any "hisses" to slow down or stop.
steps.content: Wait for any "hisses" to slow down or stop.

steps.title: Feel for the "pressure" on the container.
steps.content: Feel for the "pressure" on the container. If it feels hard, it tells you how much dissolved carbon dioxide is trapped in there.

steps.title: Get a good grip of the bottle body.
steps.content: Get a good grip of the bottle body.

steps.title: Turn the bottle cap slowly.
steps.content: Turn the bottle cap slowly. Watch and monitor the amount of "fizz" that rises to the top. If it rises too fast and a lot of hissing noises, turn the cap the other way (as if you're closing it) to slow it down. Wait about 10-15 seconds to allow it settle down, then try again.

steps.title: Turn the cap all the way to open it fully.
steps.content: Turn the cap all the way to open it fully.
